channel.title: Closure - Hern [EP]
channel.description:
Here's a new EP I guess lol, probably not gonna go back to this style as it was really hard for me to work with and I've been moving on to more straight electronic sounds. Was inspired a lot by post rock and progressive rock for this EP.
Link is here (Runtime - 27:42): https://soundcloud.com/hernmusicofficial/sets/closure?utm_source=clipboard&utm_medium=text&utm_campaign=social_sharing
Hope you guys enjoy, constructive criticism always welcome.
